name: Digital Business Partners
tag_list: digital, social-media, technology, mobile, search, display, marketing, video, facebook, twitter, youtube, google, roi, media, agency, consultancy, business, consumer, dsp, dmp, targeting, communications, brand, venture, venture-capital
overview:
We’re Digital Business consultants. We help brands, media agencies and technology vendors to get better at what they do.

We provide a full range of digital business consulting services to brands and technology vendors. We provide brand-side advisory and support services; we support implementation and delivery projects.

We work in a variety of ways depending on the scale and complexity of the assignment or project.

Our mission is to equip brands, agencies and venture capital with the capabilities to better understand, value and take advantage of digital technology.

  • Work with leading global brands and emerging tech to create digital value.
  • Support leading brands achieving consumer relevance at scale.
  • Aim to use digital technology to drive incremental brand engagement and generate leads
